Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a problem where two people need to communicate over a distance.
The student can draw a device, like a string telephone, that uses sound to send and receive information.
The student can depict how the string telephone works by showing sound traveling along the string between two cups.
The student can show that the device is capable of sending information from one person to another.
The student can represent the materials used (string and cups) in the drawing to demonstrate the device's construction.
The student can include an explanation of how their drawing resolves the communication problem using sound.
